page.title: 06MY HOUSE.
page.content: I live by the fields behind King Edward VI School in Lichfield. My house is very modern and was designed by my Dad. It has two balconies and three bedrooms.It has not always had the two balconies, we have had them added on recently. We have also had our loft converted into a landing and bathroom. All the walls upstairs are covered with pine wood strips and hessian. We have got a green spiral staircase which goes from my playroom (which used to be our garage) up to my bedroom and our workroom where my Dad keeps his drawings, his drawing board, all his pens and journals. Our house is about eighteen years old and when it was built it was one of the most modern houses in Lichfield.
